line.comment: * Make a trip to sell ware.
* $WorkspaceStruct - The data structure that describes available workspace.
* See dev manual for more details about data structures.
* $WareStruct - The data structure that describes ware settings.
* $WantedAmount - Optional parameter if you want to sell exactly specified amount.
* If specified then ship will try to sell that specified amount.
* If unspecified then will try to sell maximum possible amount.
* Positive return value means purchased amount.
* Negative return value means error. It may be for many reasons:
* the ship has no specified ware in cargo, has no station to buy,
* contains less than min. party to sell, les than $WantedAmount, etc.
* -1 - has no at least one unit of ware in cargo
* -2 - suitable consumer not found in specified workspace
* -3 - selected station has become technically unusable during the route
* -4 - selected station has become unusable at end of the route
* -6 - not enough amount in cargo (less than "% min. to sell)
* Try to sell ware at current position.

sval.val: Make a trip to sell ware.
$WorkspaceStruct - The data structure that describes available workspace.
See dev manual for more details about data structures.
$WareStruct - The data structure that describes ware settings.
$WantedAmount - Optional parameter if you want to sell exactly specified amount.
If specified then ship will try to sell that specified amount.
If unspecified then will try to sell maximum possible amount.
Positive return value means purchased amount.
Negative return value means error. It may be for many reasons:
the ship has no specified ware in cargo, has no station to buy,
contains less than min. party to sell, les than $WantedAmount, etc.
-1 - has no at least one unit of ware in cargo
-2 - suitable consumer not found in specified workspace
-3 - selected station has become technically unusable during the route
-4 - selected station has become unusable at end of the route
-6 - not enough amount in cargo (less than "% min. to sell)
Try to sell ware at current position.
